reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great for someone with dark armpits
reviews.reviewText: I liked that the product actually helps a lot in making my armpits clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Covers up odor for extended period
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a deodorant that covers up your odor for extended amount of time this is the deodorant for you. I have tried so many deodorants it’s ridiculous. Especially during summer time when it seems like my other deodorants I thought that were the best ones I found work for 45 hours before I had to reapply because of my Stench it just wasn’t good enough because basically I was applying deodorant over smell that was already there and it was making it worse so I would have to completely clean myself before applying fresh deodorant. I got tired some of this routine and looked for something that was even better and came across this and gave it a try. At first I just liked it because of the feeling as far as it felt kind of like it tightened my skin when it dried up because this is a gel but it was actually a good thing because it provided a barrier in the More area covered the better. This actually lasted I would say for a good 10 hours. Even though I know it says 48 hours in for sweat purposes yes this is great for that amount of time but I’m just speaking about odor. At least for me it lasted the longest I love any deodorant I’ve ever tried. I can see using this in other areas of my body as well but I have not tried it yet so I’m not sure if it would irritate but would definitely try it. So if you’re having issues finding something I would definitely give this a try. They have different scents so I’m sure you can find a scent that you like. And the price is actually a lot cheaper than all the other clinical deodorant out on the market surprisingly.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't find it anywhere else!
reviews.reviewText: This is my fav deodorant for years and years! About two years ago, I couldn't find the powder-scent anywhere, only the shower-fresh, or whatever, which I don't like. So now, I come here to Amazon and buy 3 or 4 packs of the powder-fresh, which is quite effective, and pleasing to my nose!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the smell I was expecting
reviews.reviewText: Mitchum seems to be the only deodorant that works for me and I've tried everything, even brands for men. I love this brand, the powder scent, the fact that it goes on clear, and it's long-lasting effect. This 4-pack, however, contradicts my expectations. It does not have that powder scent at all like the individual sticks I've purchased from retail stores. I can best describe it as bland powder that's been left out for about 100 years with a hint of "grandma" smell.I'm not sure what it is and maybe it's just the batch I got. I didn't return it because after a few seconds, the deodorant kind of conforms to my scent and smells nice so it isn't a nose sore, but I would have appreciated having that awesome powder scent that I was expecting. I have mild regrets, but plan on trying again in the future and see if maybe this 4-pack was just bad luck. Nonetheless, it's still a great buy.

The best anti perspirant. I have been using this for 3 years and will continue. There s nothing else in the market that match this standard. It doesn't make me sweat and feel refreshed throughout the day.
